subject: Flock Safety Case # 01042987
body:
You don't often get email from donotreply@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Thank you for contacting Flock Safety Support. We have received your email and opened a support case # 01042987 for you.

A support team member will review your request and respond within 48 business hours (Monday-Friday, 8 AM - 8 PM EST).

For urgent assistance, please visit our Help Center https://help.flocksafety.com/  or call us at 1-866-901-1781 during business hours and reference the case number above for immediate support.

Stay safe,
Flock Safety Support


Original Message:

Good morning,

Can someone please resend the setup link so I can activate my account?

Thanks!

Jeremy Williams
Lieutenant, Investigations Division
Eugene Police Department
300 Country Club Road
Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541) 682-5139 work

[cid:image001.png@01DBAF79.8F4D6800]



From: hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com <hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com> On Behalf Of hello@flocksafety.com
Sent: Thursday, November 21, 2024 12:27 PM
To: WILLIAMS Jeremy K <JWilliams@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Action Required: Complete Your Flock Safety Account Activation

You don't often get email from hello@flocksafety.comhello@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important<https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>

[EXTERNAL ?]

[Flock Safety]



Welcome to the Flock.

Your Flock Safety account is now active. Please click the box below within the next 96 hours to create your account.

CREATE YOUR ACCOUNT<https://login.flocksafety.com/u/reset-verify?ticket=zWl4fxDuya37JGJyjHbDNysvqjRKr1Cl#>

After 96 hours, this link will expire. If 96 hours have passed, please click here<https://users.flocksafety.com/passwordReset?email=jwilliams%40eugene-or.gov>.

Be sure to save the website to your bookmarks or favorites for easy future access. If you ever have any questions, our Customer Support team is always here for you.




Problems or questions?

[https://flock-public-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/envelope-solid.png]support@flocksafety.com

support@flocksafety.comsupport@flocksafety.com

[https://flock-public-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/phone-solid.png]support@flocksafety.com

+1 (866) 901-1781<tel:866-901-1781>




To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to hello+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com.  <https://flocksafety.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?oid=00D6g000003tehf&esid=018Pi00000gXDw3&from=ext>
